Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage
The Kohli vs. Shaheen Afridi battle was highlighted as a key contest
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side
India ended their ICC trophy drought, winning their first title since 2013
India maintained their unbeaten World Cup record against Australia
Others: Business picked up in the predictable sectors
Crowds have been waiting outside stadiums for hours after the matches finish to wave the players off
The innings break will see a mini concert, no doubt featuring a few patriotic renditions
A light-and-laser spectacle is slated for a drinks interval at night
